==Description==
Brave adventurers have begun to report that the famed four Great Dragons; [[Dungeon_Bosses#Akor|Akor]], [[Random_Dungeon_Adventure#Dragon_Progenitor|Bahamut]], [[Dungeon_Bosses#Fafnir|Fafnir]], [[Champion_Spawns#Rikktor_-_Skull_of_Power|Rikktor]] are in possession of six Scrolls of Ancient Knowledge. These scrolls are believed to be [[Dragon_Mastery#Words_of_Power|Words of Power]] on how to control and even mount [[Tameables#Dragon_.28Rideable.29|Rideable Dragons]]!

==Tome of Ancient Knowledge==
Alone, these scrolls are meaningless arcane [[Dragon_Mastery#Words_of_Power|Words of Power]]. However, once all research has been completed and kept in a Tome of Knowledge, their power can be harnessed to be used on [[Tameables#Dragon_.28Rideable.29|Rideable Dragons]].

==Rideable Dragons==
Not all Dragons are rideable, however when you do find a [[Tameables#Dragon_.28Rideable.29|Rideable Dragon]], the completed questline will allow you to mount one!
